CS:GO kanser kitlesinden bıktıysanız, bilgisayarınız kaldırmıyorsa, kasıyorsa veya hilelerden bıktıysanız kesinlikle oynamanızı tavsiye ederim.

NOT: oyunda hile yok demiyorum ama en azından CS:GO'daki hilelerden daha az.

Its was good. Gmod texture time

I know its an old game but the gameplay and movement is smoother than CSGO and its just more fun. CSGO is more advanced and thus its just frustrating sometimes to the point where it stops being a game and becomes a chore, as well as losing its fun factor. 

Counter Strike Source is simpler and easier to the point where anyone can hop in and perform decently, and not suck. Also the community is much better than CSGO at the moment, the people are nicer, theres a lot of teamwork and almost no toxicity. 

Classic maps such as Dust II and Office are in their original (and superior) form, Valve changed a lot of maps too much as well as their individual themes, Dust II is not really Dust II in CSGO, it has just lost its way.

I personally like this game much more than CSGO and I will die on this hill.
